safe.question: Is it safe to use your services?
safe.answer: Yes, all our services are completely safe. We don't request account passwords and use only official promotion methods. Your account remains under your full control.

speed.question: How quickly does order execution start?
speed.answer: Most orders start executing within 30 minutes after payment. Time may vary depending on service type and current load.

disappeared.question: What to do if followers or likes disappeared?
disappeared.answer: We have a guarantee on all services. If the quantity decreased during the warranty period, we'll top up to the ordered volume for free. Contact support with your order number.

cancel.question: Can I cancel an order?
cancel.answer: Orders can only be cancelled before execution starts. If work has already begun, cancellation is not possible. We recommend carefully checking data before payment.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept bank cards, e-wallets, and bank transfers. All payments go through secure payment systems.

algorithm.question: Does promotion affect reach and algorithms?
algorithm.answer: Our services help improve account metrics, which positively affects social media algorithms. Quality followers and activity contribute to organic growth.

reviews.title: Client Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Real results and experiences from our clients

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and use your data
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect only necessary data to provide services.
privacy.noPasswords: We never request passwords from your accounts.
privacy.dataUsageText: Data is used to fulfill orders and provide support.
privacy.noThirdParty: We don't share data with third parties without your consent.
privacy.dataProtectionText: We use technical and organizational protection measures.
privacy.yourRightsText: You can request, correct, or delete your data.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to improve site functionality and analyze traffic. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.cookiesAnonymous: Anonymous data is used for traffic analysis, which doesn't allow identifying specific users.
privacy.policyChangesText: We may update this privacy policy. We'll notify you of significant changes via email or site notifications.
privacy.contactText: For privacy questions, contact us through the feedback form on the

terms.subtitle: Terms of using SMM Boost services
terms.generalText1: This agreement governs the relationship between the user and SMM Boost.
terms.generalText2: By using the site, you accept the terms of the agreement.
terms.servicesText: We provide social media promotion services.
terms.clientObligation1: Provide correct data for order fulfillment
terms.clientObligation3: Not use services for illegal purposes
terms.paymentText: Payment is made before order execution begins. We accept bank cards, e-wallets, and cryptocurrencies.
terms.refundText: Refunds are only possible if the order is not fulfilled due to SMM Boost's fault. Details in the "Refund Policy" section.
terms.restrictionsText: It is prohibited to use our services for:
terms.contactText: For privacy questions, contact us through the feedback form on the

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Terms and procedure for refunding funds
refund.whenPossibleText: Refund is possible if the order is not fulfilled due to our fault.
refund.cancelledByClient: Cancellation by client before work begins
refund.whenNotPossibleText: Refunds are NOT made in cases:
refund.notPossible2: Client changed account privacy settings after order
refund.notPossible3: Account was blocked or deleted after order fulfillment
refund.notPossible4: Natural decrease in metrics over time
refund.notPossible5: Client provided incorrect data for order fulfillment
refund.notPossible6: More than 30 days have passed since order fulfillment
refund.step3Text: We'll review your application within 24 hours and respond
refund.step4Text: If approved, refund occurs within 3-7 business days
refund.methodsText: Refund is made using the same method as payment:
refund.partialText1: If service was provided partially, partial refund is possible proportional to unfulfilled volume.
refund.partialText2: For example, if 1000 followers were ordered but only 700 were provided, refund will be 30% of order cost.
refund.contactText: For privacy questions, contact us through the feedback form on the

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our services

speed.question: How quickly does an order start?
speed.answer: From 0 to 30 minutes on average. Depends on system load and service type. Likes usually start coming fastest, followers may take up to an hour.

realAccounts.question: Will subscription/like come from real accounts?
realAccounts.answer: Yes, we use only verified traffic sources. All followers have avatars, posts and look like real users.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: If service was not provided in full, refund is possible. Details in the "Refund Policy" section.

safe.question: Is it safe for my account?
safe.answer: Completely safe. We don't request passwords, use only public links. All methods comply with social media rules.

disappeared.question: What to do if followers disappeared?
disappeared.answer: We have a guarantee on all services. If quantity decreased during the warranty period, we'll top up to ordered volume for free.

closedAccount.question: Can I order services for a closed account?
closedAccount.answer: For most services, account must be public. Exception - followers, they can be added to closed profiles too.

discounts.question: Are there discounts for large orders?
discounts.answer: Yes, for orders from 50,000₸ we provide 10% discount. For orders from 100,000₸ - 15% discount. Contact support.
